practice_phrases.target: I want to meet him today.
I want to meet new people.

practice_phrases.known: 我想今天晚上认识会说英语的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who speak English this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 我想在六点认识和你一起学习的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people learning with you at six o'clock.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想认识人，所以我今天要去。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to meet people, I'm going to go today.

practice_phrases.known: 我想认识能帮我练习说话的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who can help me practise speaking.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我很快就要认识会说英语的人了。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to meet people who speak English soon.
